title: Observationes Theologo-Practicae Eaeq[ue] Tripartitae
creator: Walm, Heinrich
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Walm, Heinrich: Observationes Theologo-Practicae Eaeq[ue] Tripartitae  Quarum Prima Exhibet breviter & Fidei & Pietatis doctrinam, cum quomodo utraque recte ac integre tradenda, tum quomodo altera sine alterius detrimento in Ecclesia retinenda sit. Altera agit de Sanctificatione Diei Dominicae ... Tertia Est de rei alienae Restitutione .... Halberstadi[i]  Berlin
publisher: Typis Kolwaldianis  Staatsbibliothek zu Berlin – Preußischer Kulturbesitz, Germany
